::Dark Rodimus::
   
  In his sub-councious Dark Rodimus can feel the spider spy on him and the probe inserted into the base of his neck. He wants to reach back scratch the "itch" but his body is still in a dorment deactivated state. He does nothing for now.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          
--- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

> Jhiaxus steps back after removing the helmet. Hot Rod is still
> dorment but now unbound. Jhiaxus and Zarak leave the room and face
> Hydras.
> 
> Jhiaxus: Dark Rodimus is ready.

As the duo left the room, the small spider-spy that had been watching,
scuttled down the wall and over to where the newly modified Dark
Rodimus lay dormant. Quickly it ran up his form to a spot in his armor
at the base of the back of his neck. Here it paused as it attempted to
hide itself by shifting its color to match Dark Rodimus' armor, and
then painlessly it inserted a probe. 

Perhaps it would be possible to upload information from his nural net
about the Maximals? about his programming? about this new information
that reprogrammed him? 

Insuring that any information gathered was loaded into the unused
buffers of it abdominal memory core, the spider spy attempted the
upload!

OOC: It's up to you if it is successful or not :)

Preston
(Da'minion)
